name: What The Spark - Celebrate the 4th of July!
name_original: What The Spark - Celebrate the 4th of July!
description:
Celebrate America and the 4th of July!
An addicting game to test your reflexes. Build a rhythm in a fun simple race against time!

[How to play]
> Get to the next checkpoint before time runs out.
> Keep the fireworks show going!

Two Modes:
> Choose Sparkler for practice or simply to relax and enjoy the game
> Light Up The Sky to earn the best score and beat all your friends!

"The Star Spangled Banner" was ordered to be played at military and naval occasions by President Woodrow Wilson in 1916, even though it was not designated the national anthem by an Act of Congress until 1931.

For the game's soundtrack, enjoy a performance of "The Star Spangled Banner" recorded by the United States Navy Band!

Good luck!
Have fun!
Tell us what you think: whatthespark@gmail.com
